version_description:
- Implemented a new user interface
- Added a new gun, the MP5
- Fixed multiplayer, you can now log in and play multiplayer as usual
- Other bug fixes

- Added a new weapon, the AK-47

- Added a new gold-exclusive weapon, “Vector”
- AK-47 out of early access
- Raised max rank from 80 to 100
- Early access weapons now show “Early Access”
- Added 5 new camos
- Rarity of camos are now shown in the load out
- Out of map glitch patched on Outpost
- Increased RPM of M200, and increased hip fire and moving accuracy
- Buffed 870 MCS at close range, but nerfed at mid/long range

- Added ability to buy 3 new loadouts (Delta, Echo, Foxtrot) in the Customize menu
- Added a new gun for early access, the M60
- Added a new gold-exclusive gun, the Desert Eagle
- Added a new camo, "Bricks"
- Increased AK47 damage to make it a 3-shot kill in close range, and slight decrease to recoil
- Nerfed RPG damage and splash range
- Increased MP5's hip fire and automatic accuracy, slightly decreased damage
- Added support button in settings
- Fixed out-of-bounds glitch on Outpost

Added 2 new guns (M16 and .44 Magnum).
Added new map called Meltdown.
Added 6 new gun skins.
Added spawn protection for 2 seconds after spawning.
Added ability to customize and save 3 HUD slots.
Added a replay match button at the end of matches.
Added gold indicator on home page videos.
Fixed language switching issue.
Enhanced back end tools for moderators & admins.
Fixed misc map glitches.

- Added ability to report cheaters in-game.
- Added M1911 & Lewis Gun.
- Added new perk, called ‘Kevlar’, to protect against Throwing Knives and Shurikens.
- Added Push Notifications.
- Added Bad Word Filter.
- Fixed misc bugs.
- Added rules button.
- Upgraded development platforms.

- 增加了新的ACR枪（见特别优惠！）
- 添加允许的武器选择器来创建自定义匹配
- 增加了匹配过滤器来搜索匹配
- 抛光刘易斯枪和M1911
- 修正misc武器故障
- 增强报告作弊者的功能
- 修正了地图故障和其他错误的错误
Bug fix for buying cases and camos with credits.

We got a lot in this new release!

A new Map for you to conquer is here! Canyon: not only is it a breathtaking masterpiece, but it’s also a great place for combat! We can't wait to see you in there!

Need a new weapon? We got you covered! The new L85 assault rifle is here and waiting for you to use in combat! Great looking, and complete with excellent accuracy!

Last but not the least, a new game mode is ready for you to try! Don't lose sight of your VIP, and protect them at any cost! We know you will love this new game mode! We also fixed some various bugs in the game, including Hardcore mode.

Added a Tec 9 - A new gun brought to the battlefield
Rebalanced of Shorty SG / AUG and L85
Disabled Spawn Protection
Revamped several spawn points
Fixed the Perks inherited glitch
Fixed the multiple join feed

-Added Seasons (Short pre season warmup before the main season starts)
-Added new player model
-Added new VSS Sniper with built in suppressor
-Added new Minigun weapon with unique hold position
-Added many new skins
-Rebalanced the Val (Increased range)
-Limited holiday sale is here! Everything 25-35% off!
-Many, many, many bug fixes

-Added a friend system
-Added Spas-12 shotgun
-Added MP7 submachine gun
-Added Karambit knife
-Added new skins and offers
-Improved the M16 model
-Improved ads, skins can now be obtained for watching ads
-Various bug fixes and improvements

-Fixed Several Map glitches in City and Woods
-Fixed bug related to player camos
-Fixed bug related to gold cases and skins
-Other Minor fixes

-Fixed the grenade issue halting midair
-Other various bug fixes
- Implemented Tap Research ad support

- New Matchmaking
- Welcome screen for new players
- New special offers
- Switching sides is disabled after the match starts
- Switching sides is enabled 15 seconds before the match starts

-Rebalanced the AK-12
-Rebalanced the AK-47
-Rebalanced the L85
-Rebalanced the Desert Eagle
-Rebalanced the Badger Q
-Improved the Ad System
-Minor Ui Changes

- Added FAL weapon
- Updated multiplayer UI
- Fixed freeze in welcome screen
- Fixed a slow connection data corruption bug
- Other minor bug fixes

New gun AI-AWP (early access)
Removed the referral field in new user registration
Rebalanced the M4A1
Fixed the scoping issue in M200
Fixed various map glitches

-Fixed the weapon stats not counting correctly
-Fixed accounts randomly resetting, and created a way to recover accounts
-Fixed the leaderboard not counting correctly
-Fixed glitch spots in Aftermath
-Fixed glitch spot in Urban

Added a Tec 9 - A new gun brought to the battlefield
Rebalanced of Shorty SG / AUG and L85
Disabled Spawn Protection
Revamped several spawn points
Fixed the Perks inherited glitch
Fixed the multiple join feed
Added offline mode feature

CHRISTMAS UPDATE IS HERE!

NEW MAP
- Our biggest map ever.


NEW WEAPON RANKS WITH REWARDS

2 GUNS
- Badger Q
- Minebea 9

HACKER PREVENTION
- Added Vote Kick System, so you can vote to have a player kicked from the match.
- Enhanced back end tools to help with banning hackers.

SPECIAL OFFERS
- Many Christmas deals!

MISC
- Added new animated skins, and they are HOT!
- New ad provider.
- Fixed minor bugs.
